name: Leaf_Plush_Oversized_Accent_Chair
reviews: I order two of these chairs to go with my sofa and loveseat. The price was very good for accent chairs after I had shopped arount in my area's local furniture stores and there was little assembly, which my husband loved :-)

This 'oversized' chair is actually what I consider to be a petite and small, low chair. It was a rather big surprise to have it be so low to the ground, more like a bench height. It is perfect for small corners, small spaces, apt. or condo living if you need just a chair for short amounts of time. It is not a lounging, reading, tv watching chair as it has no arms and is not that enveloping and cushy. It is in the corner of our bedroom and is used mostly to put shoes and socks on or off or talk on the phone. The fabric and construction are fine for the amount this cost.
description: This accent chair's individualized style and oversized proportions will be a beautiful addition to any room of your home. Inspired by modern styles, this side chair features an oversized plush upholstered seat and back, solid hardwoods throughout, and patterned fabric finish.
